title: Always
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hey, love
My first love
My last love
I can't stop looking for you
I'm movin'
But can't move on
Since you've gone
I don't know what to do
[Pre-Chorus]
So emotional
Can't let love go
I'm a midnight shade of blue
I've been broken in
I can't start again
Can't trade you for something new
[Chorus]
I will always love you
You will always be the one
I will always, I'll wait for you
I will always love you
You will always be the one
Know that always, I'll wait for you

[Verse 2]
Why am I
Stuck in time?
Stuck inside
While the whole world's passing me by
This old song
Keeps playing on
The melody's so strong
I can't help but sing along
[Pre-Chorus]
So emotional
Can't let love go
I'm a midnight shade of blue
I've been broken in
I can't start again
Can't trade you for something new
[Chorus]
I will always love you
You will always be the one
I will always, I'll wait for you
I will always love you
You will always be the one
Know that always, I'll wait for you

[Bridge]
I've been everywhere
No one else compares to you
Nobody here
In your stratosphere
I gotta get back to you
I'm tellin' you I wanna get back to you
[Chorus]
I will always love you
You will always be the one
I will always, I'll wait for you
I will always love you
You will always be the one
Know that always, I'll wait for you
[Outro]
Oh
Oh, oh
Hey, love
My first love
My last love
Oh
